results.title: Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme Inhibition and Parathyroid Hormone Secretion
results.text_hl: Participants with @<m>DISEASE_Hyperparathyroidism_Primary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D049950 @@@P-HPT@@@ had @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ titrated to a maximum daily dose of 16.9 (12.8) mg (range 2.5-30 mg), and participants without @<m>DISEASE_Hyperparathyroidism_Primary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D049950 @@@P-HPT@@@ had @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ titrated to a maximum dose of 11.3 (7.3) mg (range 5-40 mg), P = 0.17.

citations.NLM: Zaheer S, Brown JM, Connors M, Williams JS, Adler GK, Vaidya A. Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme Inhibition and Parathyroid Hormone Secretion Int J Endocrinol. 2017;2017():4138783. PMID: 28808443
